entry.title: Web Features That May Not Work As Youâ€™d Expect
entry.summary: As the web gets more and more capable, developers are able to make richer online experiences. There are times, however, where some new web capabilities may not work as you would expect in the interest of usability, security and privacy.â€¦ The post Web Features That May Not Work As Youâ€™d Expect appeared first on CSS-Tricks. You can support CSS-Tricks by being an MVP Supporter.

entry.title: A Guide To Attracting Clients To Your Agency
entry.summary: Many web design agencies consider it a badge of honor that they win work exclusively through word-of-mouth recommendations. In this article, Paul Boag explains why that is entirely the wrong attitude and what to do about it.
